channel.title: Wasm on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Wasm on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Implement a rust game through WASM
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Design a simple game concept suitable for implementation in Rust. Develop the game logic and user interface in Rust. Compile and optimize the Rust code for WASM. Test game performance and compatibility across various browsers.
